original_title: Ville Pirinen: A Day in the Mouth episode 6
overview: Ville Pirinen is a hard rocking visual arts freelancer and a musician living in Tampere, Finland. He plays in a multitude of bands including Black Audio, Seremonia, Steel Mammoth and draws and writes comics such as “Ornette Birks Makkonen” and “Yhesti yhes paikas”.
title: Ville Pirinen: A Day in the Mouth episode 6
